description: Bats are winged flying mammals that live worldwide.  With over 1100 bat species worldwide, there is a tremendous variety amongst these interesting creatures.  Often seen as simply a nuisance, or often as a terrifying sight associated with vampires and swarming girls with long hair,these creatures are actually fascinating mammals that are of little concern to humans.  This ebook takes an in depth and objective look at the bat, outside all the common misconceptions.  Topics covered include the behaviors, species, ecology, reproduction, habitat and many other interesting characteristsics.  Download this book today and learn the true nature of this fascinating type of animal.
